title: People who eat meat are disgusting creatures
body:
Fam decided to cook steaks and vegetables

well now I'm stuck cutting up this hunk of crap for my cat

I tried to put a piece of it in my mouth but had to spit it out because of how revolting the taste was

seriously once you learn about how corrupt the meat industry is and try tasting your food instead of smothering it in chemicals/salt you never go back

have you ever smelled your chicken? that chicken smell is enough to induce vomiting
